Name: Geometry Hero
About the game: 2D Action - Basic action manipulation such as double jump, air attack, and combo attacks. - Some physical is required. Stages - Clear the first to ninth floors and boss, you clear the stage. - Total 6 stages are ready and you can watch the Ending. Skill Combination - Clearing stage unlocks more skills you can choose. Find skill combinations that suit you. Roguelite Feature - Skills and items disappear after the end of each stages. Upgrades - You can permanently upgrade the player through the jewels you have acquired. Unlocks Clearing some stage unlocks new characters. Clearing some Silver Room unlocks new movement skills. Clearing some Gold Room unlocks new passives. Time Attack - Don't waste even a second! No matter what, kill them faster, you get more items.
